sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Vision Care Plan Regulation Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Vision Care Plan Regulation Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.   As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Fees for covered services and covered materials
sections.text: Fees paid under a vision care plan for covered services and covered materials, regardless of the supplier or optical lab used to obtain materials, shall be reasonable and shall be clearly listed on a fee schedule that has been provided to the eye car

sections.heading: Subcontractors.  The provisions of this Act apply to any subcontractors used by a vision care organization to supply materials or services to an eye care provider or an enrollee under a vision care plan
sections.text: Subcontractors. The provisions of this Act apply to any subcontractors used by a vision care organization to supply materials or services to an eye care provider or an enrollee under a vision care plan.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
